trans-unit.target: 灵念伴侣

trans-unit.resname: NEO·38 | Spirited Companion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Spirited Companion enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当灵念伴侣进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·38 | Spirited Companion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She formed a friendship with several playful spirits, and soon "the pack" was known as the source of much mischief in Eiganjo.
trans-unit.target: 她与几个淘气神灵结下友谊，很快这一「小团体」就成为永岩城内诸多恶戏的根源。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·39 | Sunblade Samurai | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunblade Samurai
trans-unit.target: 阳刃武士

trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: NEO·39 | Sunblade Samurai | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Channel — {2}, Discard Sunblade Samurai: Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 魂力～{2}，弃掉阳刃武士：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的平原牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·40 | Touch the Spirit Realm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Touch the Spirit Realm
trans-unit.target: 亲触灵界

trans-unit.resname: NEO·40 | Touch the Spirit Realm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Touch the Spirit Realm enters the battlefield, exile up to one target artifact or creature until Touch the Spirit Realm leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当亲触灵界进战场时，放逐至多一个目标神器或生物，直到亲触灵界离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·40 | Touch the Spirit Realm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Touch the Spirit Realm: Exile target artifact or creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 魂力～{1}{W}，弃掉亲触灵界：放逐目标神器或生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·41 | Wanderer's Intervention | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wanderer's Intervention
trans-unit.target: 飘萍干预

trans-unit.resname: NEO·41 | Wanderer's Intervention | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Wanderer's Intervention deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 飘萍干预对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·41 | Wanderer's Intervention | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Just as Jin-Gitaxias's victory seemed certain, the Wanderer appeared, her blade already in motion. One mighty slash was enough to take the praetor out of the fight.
trans-unit.target: 金吉塔厦自认大局底定时，飘萍突然现身，手中长剑已扬。只见亮光闪过，她的一记重斩就足以击碎魔判官的所有胜算。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Wandering Emperor
trans-unit.target: 飘萍皇

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as The Wandering Emperor entered the battlefield this turn, you may activate her loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant.
trans-unit.target: 只要飘萍皇是于本回合进战场，你便可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下起动她的忠诚异能。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：在至多一个目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: −1：派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的武士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text: Paragraph 5
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Exile target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: −2：放逐目标已横置的生物。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·43 | When We Were Young | Card Name
trans-unit.source: When We Were Young
trans-unit.target: 遥想年少

trans-unit.resname: NEO·43 | When We Were Young | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an artifact and an enchantment, those creatures also gain lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 至多两个目标生物各得+2/+2直到回合结束。如果你同时操控神器和结界，则这些生物再获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·43 | When We Were Young | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Since Imperial custom strictly forbade the Emperor to reveal her name—even to Kaito, her closest childhood friend—she had to suffer him calling her "your emperorness" for much of their shared youth.
trans-unit.target: 皇室严禁今上向任何人透露自己姓名～就连她的青梅竹马魁渡也不例外。因此在共度的大半年少岁月中，她只得一直忍受对方称呼自己「皇上」。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Acquisition Octopus
trans-unit.target: 窃物八爪械

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Acquisition Octopus or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当窃物八爪械或佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Reconfigure {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 重配{2}（{2}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上；或从生物上卸装。重配的时机视同法术。它于贴附期间不是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You can never have too many arms.
trans-unit.target: 再多手都不嫌多。

trans-unit.target: 锚定实界

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·45 | Anchor to Reality | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If it has mana value less than the sacrificed permanent's mana value, scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张武具或载具牌，将该牌放进战场，然后洗牌。如果该牌的法术力值小于所牺牲之永久物，则占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·45 | Anchor to Reality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Wanderer sighed in relief as the Reality Chip tethered her wayward spark to Kamigawa.
trans-unit.target: 飘萍眼见实界晶片将其难控火花栓定神河之后，反而长舒一口气。

trans-unit.source: I — Creatures you don't control get -2/-0 until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: I — 不由你操控的生物得-2/-0直到你的下一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·48 | Behold the Unspeakable | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: II — If you have one or fewer cards in hand, draw four cards. Otherwise, scry 2, then draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: II — 如果你的手牌为一张或更少，则抓四张牌。若否，则占卜2，然后抓两张牌。

trans-unit.target: III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.target: 纵使学院门生难承重压失智发狂，但蓟夫人对禁识神痴迷之情却只增不减。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·49 | Covert Technician | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 隐秘技师

trans-unit.resname: NEO·49 | Covert Technician | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 忍术{1}{U}（{1}{U}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: NEO·49 | Covert Technician | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Covert Technician deals combat damage to a player, you may put an artifact card with mana value less than or equal to that damage from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当隐秘技师对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以将一张法术力值等于或小于该伤害的神器牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·50 | Discover the Impossible | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Discover the Impossible
trans-unit.target: 探索未然

trans-unit.resname: NEO·50 | Discover the Impossible | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library. Exile one of them face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if it's an instant spell with mana value 2 or less. If you don't, put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。牌面朝下地放逐其中一张，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。如果所放逐之牌是法术力值等于或小于2的瞬间咒语，则你可以施放它，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未如此作，则将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.target: 扰序协定

trans-unit.resname: NEO·51 | Disruption Protocol | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 横置一个由你操控且未横置的神器或支付{1}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·51 | Disruption Protocol | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·51 | Disruption Protocol | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let's just turn that off, shall we?"
trans-unit.target: 「就把它关掉吧，如何？」

trans-unit.resname: NEO·52 | Essence Capture | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。在至多一个目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·52 | Essence Capture | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Futurists regard the tradition of kami-bonding as anachronistic and inefficient, striving constantly to surpass spiritual power with technology.
trans-unit.target: 赛博派觉得「结神缘」这一传统既过时效果又不彰，故而致力发展科技，希冀有朝一日以此超越灵力。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·53 | Futurist Operative | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Futurist Operative
trans-unit.target: 赛博派特务

trans-unit.resname: NEO·53 | Futurist Operative | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as Futurist Operative is tapped, it's a Human Citizen with base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 只要赛博派特务已横置，它便是基础力量与防御力为1/1的人类／市民，且不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·53 | Futurist Operative | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: Untap Futurist Operative.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}：重置赛博派特务。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·53 | Futurist Operative | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Imperials can't arrest you for illegal tech if you never even existed."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你未曾存在，皇室当然就没法以滥用技术罪名来拘捕你。」

trans-unit.resname: NEO·54 | Futurist Sentinel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Futurist Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 赛博派哨卫

trans-unit.source: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 搭载3（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: NEO·54 | Futurist Sentinel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I folded a model in paper first to test the relative tensile strength of the plates."\n—Katsumasa, the Animator
trans-unit.target: 「我是先用纸来折出模型，好测试钢板之间的相对拉伸强度。」 ～灵机贺津间佐

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}. When you do, target player mills X cards, where X is the number of Shrines you control. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.source: "While they squabble below, let us rise above."\n—Emire, director of the Saiba Futurists

trans-unit.resname: NEO·59 | Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant
trans-unit.target: 进展暴君金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: NEO·59 | Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, you gain 4 life.

For as long as you control Kotose, you may play one of the exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

trans-unit.source: When Kotose, the Silent Spider enters the battlefield, exile target card other than a basic land card from an opponent's graveyard. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles. For as long as you control Kotose, you may play one of the exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物死去时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·496 | Eater of Virtue | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·496 | Eater of Virtue | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as a card exiled with Eater of Virtue has flying, equipped creature has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 只要以残贤刃放逐的某张牌具有飞行异能，佩带此武具的生物便具有飞行异能；且先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·496 | Eater of Virtue | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Equip {1}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{1}

trans-unit.source: {5}, Exile Mechtitan Core and four other artifact creatures and/or Vehicles you control: Create Mechtitan, a legendary 10/10 Construct artifact creature token with flying, vigilance, trample, lifelink, and haste that's all colors. When that token leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with Mechtitan Core except Mechtitan Core to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.
trans-unit.target: {5}，放逐机体泰坦核心和四个由你操控的其他神器生物和／或载具：派出传奇衍生神器生物机体泰坦，其为10/10，具飞行、警戒、践踏、系命与敏捷异能且是五色的组构体。当该衍生物离开战场时，将所有以机体泰坦核心放逐的牌分别在其拥有者之操控下横置移回战场，但机体泰坦核心除外。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·509 | Enthusiastic Mechanaut | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Greetings, fellow inventors!" the akki shouted, attempting a friendly smile. To her dismay, the greeting was met only with shrieks and alarms being activated.
trans-unit.target: 「各位发明家同僚，大家好！」恶鬼高声招呼，脸上还试着要堆出一丝微笑。但令她失望的是，她的一番问候只换来了惊声尖叫和警报齐鸣。
